name: Sphères
description:
Sphères is a contemplative experience about forms and sounds.

Play with your keyboard (azertyuiop keys for long sounds, 123456789 for percussive sounds) or with a MIDI keyboard (C3 to C5, white keys for long sounds, black keys for percussive sounds).

Team:

  • Game Design: Icare Bamba & Rémi Prodeo
  • UX: Aurélien Rivat
  • Art: Magali Lefort & Youcef Mnakri
  • Sound: Marion Perret
  • Programming: Simon Gigant & Pierre Ulysse
